text: "Super Trooper" is a 1980 song by ABBA and is the title track to their seventh studio album Super Trooper. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Germany, Norway, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium and Ireland, number 3 in Switzerland, Mexico and Austria and made number 45 in the United States. It went to be covered by A-Teens and Cher. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:ABBA songs Category:Cher songs
title: Super Trouper (song)
